title: Please realize 3/1/10 is way better than 20/19/2
body: especially if you are an early game champion, or they have late game champions, trading kills = slow suicide.

replies.body: I'm sure this post has nothing to do with the other thread titled _ 8/7/0 is not better than 0/7/20_. Nothing at all.
At least they didn't copy reddit.... They didn't right?
The postgame should have a "Gold given to enemy team" stat so people realize this.

{{champion:81}} I WENT 25/23/5 I CARREED!!1

> [{quoted}](name=Little Mac is OP,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=emVJkA9L,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-05T22:52:05.324+0000)
>
> The postgame should have a "Gold given to enemy team" stat so people realize this.

I think it actually does account for that in "gold spent".

if an ez got 23 deaths something is wrong and i see trump written all over it
the end of the world is coming
impossible is now possible

Implying other candidates would be better than trump.
Kek.
They would be, not that any would be great.

Trump isn't great, but neither are any of the alternatives.
Hillary should be in jail, sanders is a socialist cuck, and while there are some good republican candidates, in the current state of the election, they can't stop trump.
What law did Hilary break? Or are you just saying she's not a good candidates?
The whole e-mail thing.

Thats an investigation. The FBI has not found any miss conduct on here part. As of today there is no substantial evidence that could convict her of a crime if she had committed one. Though I do dislike her because of her flipflop nature on issues and lying on several occasions, I wouldn't saw she is a criminal based on the idea of innocent until proven guilty.

She was accused of mishandling classified information.  It has been confirmed that she did indeed, mishandle not just secret and top secret material... but also SAP material.  Its hardly a "innocent until proven guilty" scenario.  Its much more of a "she didn't follow the proper protocol, lets see how much damage was done (if any) and figure out what the next step should be" situation.

Fox news might be saying that but as of right now the FBI has only confirmed they are doing an investigation (if they had significant evidence that proves her guilty she would already be convicted). If the FBI finds evidence showing that Hilliary is at fault. Then she deserves to go to jail. But until the FBI finishes there investigation she is not a criminal nor deserves to go to jail. She is woman that is accused of mishandling classified information. Under our laws she is innocent until proven guilty by a court of law.
Sanders isn't a cuck. He's just REALLY misled and naive. Cruz would have a chance if Rubio dropped out, but unfortunately that's probably not going to happen.

http://m.imgur.com/YJIXjhK

:^)

uhhhhh? okay....
I don't think the people voting for sanders are all homosexuals or transgender. Bernie isn't running on a anarchy plan, You can argue on whether or not his policies would work or not is justified, but ever major candidate running wants what they think would help the American people. Whether there plan would work is up for you to decided.
U do know that gay marriage is legal according to the Supreme Court right? And sanders as president won't really make a difference.
Sanders has spent literally decades dealing with the national government. On what ground do you stand upon that you can call him "REALLY misled and naive"?

Just because he's been a senator doesn't mean that he automatically knows exactly what he's doing. Look at Rubio. Yeah, he's worked in Congress for a really long time, but you should keep in mind that in all his time, he's only had 3 bills he's sponsored been passed, 2 of which were renaming post offices. I like the guy, but it's doubtful that he'll actually win since people avoid voting for him because Hillary has so much sway, people don't like socialists, the numbers don't really check out like he says they 
will, and he's really old and not 
in very good shape. Yeah 
Hilary's old, but she looks to be in way better shape.

I haven't paid a whole lot of attention to the upcoming election, but so far, I think Cruz is the most reasonable of the candidates that are having any success.  However, none of the Democratic/Republican candidates seem like they would be great presidents to me personally... We need someone who is foremost a leader, not a shallow politician or celebrity clown...

I personally wish Rand Paul could get a chance.  People dissatisfied with Republican/Democrat politics should support Libertarian.  The Republicans/Democrats are too invested in the status quo to bring about much meaningful improvement.  The dominant political parties have shifted before.  If we young voters push for Libertarian, I think we can make it happen.

Even if you don't think the Libertarians have a chance to win this time, you can help them get more support in the future by voting for them.

> [{quoted}](name=Little Mac is OP,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=emVJkA9L,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-03-05T22:52:05.324+0000)
>
> The postgame should have a "Gold given to enemy team" stat so people realize this.

Like...for the love of big anime titties why don't we have that already?
To be fair, 20/19/2 is most likely the score of the 1 guy who did well on an otherwise massively feeding team.
but 19 deaths IS massively feeding
The only way I don't see those 19 deaths as a problem is if they were all Support sacrifices but then that brings up the question why the support has 20 kills.

Or the assassin nailed the carry and hoped the team would follow up but it was just tumble weeds and everyone was split pushing. Apparently it happened 19 times.

{{champion:91}} : "OK THE CARRY IS DOWN EVERYONE GO!!!" -looks behind him and sees no one- ;-; "Please spare me... my sphincter is not ready for this..."

{{champion:33}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:89}} : "No lube."
in that case the assassin is getting ultra fed just to trade for a 1 for 1, while dying 19 times, feeding tons of gold all over the enemy team.

This irks me. I remember a game where I had a Talon who constantly traded 1 for 1, all game. Also, since he was a Talon, if he got a kill it was solo, whereas the enemy team got plenty of assists from his deaths, thereby increasing the amount of gold he gave them by 50%.

Mid game, he's near 15 kills and 15 deaths. It's much harder for me, the top laner who won lane with a mild score of 2/0/3, to carry a game when every person on their team has more gold than I do.

(All these numbers were pulled out of thin air, as this was like a year ago. But you get the point.)
Maybe 18 of those deaths were the guy running into the enemy's turrets because they got trapped and didn't wanna give them kills

Especially when resetting your gold by getting kills on top of it. I'd honestly rather see 1-19-0 than getting a bunch of kills on top of it. Feeding ceases to be feeding when you're only worth a cannon minion.
19 deaths is never justified when playing league of legends, ever.

> [{quoted}](name=Slamurai Jack,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=emVJkA9L,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-03-05T23:19:23.108+0000)
>
> To be fair, 20/19/2 is most likely the score of the 1 guy who did well on an otherwise massively feeding team.

Depends.

 always get a kick out of the {{champion:51}}  I see constantly killing {{champion:67}} , but dying to her + {{champion:11}}  +{{champion:16}} .

Then the 8/5/0 {{champion:51}}  Is wondering why she's dying to the 4/8 /6 {{champion:67}}   That then proceeds to get multiple pentakills and eventually win the game.
What about 3/1/**0** ? {{champion:75}}
Who needs to kill champions when you can 1-shot towers?

Depends on the champ.

20/19 Twitch will blow a your ass off, a 3/1/10 twitch is typically not a big threat. Tryn/Yi/Jax/Twitch should always trade kills if no other objective is involved.

KDA means nothing

If 2/15/5 generates more map pressure than 3/1/10 then so be it
at 15 death you're generating map pressure alright, just not for the right team
Unless its ARAM.
If it's ARAM, everyone's feeding anyways.

Lies.
3/1/10 = 13 kill participation.
20/19/2 = 22 kill participation.
5700 gold vs 300

But they have also given the enemy team 19 kills while the other person only gave one. If the 20/19/2 didn't give so many than the match wouldn't be so hard to win. He could be 10/3/2 or 5/2/2 and not give the enemy team such an advantage. A player that has that type of KDA shows that they throw caution to the wind and are usually the type to throw matches.

1. You cant play chicken if the enemy team will ouscale you mid/late game your sitting on a ticking timebomb. If your to passive you will lose the game at some point without making a mistake. 

2. The Situation is fundamental different for each matchup! Trading with a champion what outscale you is of course bad but if you have the better scalling its the opposite.

3. Like it ot not Hypercarries can win the games alone the best examples we all probably experienced is a master yi. With a similar score of 20/19/2 he can destroy teams without problems.

4. Yeah a player with 20/19/2 died many times and spends a long time at the nexus but the at same time this counts for the enemy to because he died a equal number of times.

I assume you spend no time to think or look at the situation.

Because you woud have noticed the gap between the **ADC Kills**  and the **Support Assists**

There are not many possibilitys to create somthing like this!

A Support is AFK
B Support is always somewhere else on the map
C Support is only half of the time where he shoud be

But he the Support has the better KDA so the ADC must be at fault!

Beside this it looks like it does not matter to you that the Kog is dead even on kills and has full build. Or that 1 mistake can cost you the game.

> [{quoted}](name=Lost Hp,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=emVJkA9L,comment-id=001d,timestamp=2016-03-07T01:48:31.365+0000)

> B Support is always somewhere else on the map
> C Support is only half of the time where he shoud be
> 
> But he the Support has the better KDA so the ADC must be at fault!
> 
> Beside this it looks like it does not matter to you that the Kog is dead even on kills and has full build. Or that 1 mistake can cost you the game.

I didn't say that's support and adc score in the one game tho, they are supposed to be different scenarios of the same person. sorry I didn't take time to read over the block of text you wrote and realize that's how you thought. I randomly made those numbers up, they are not from a real game, and I'm not a butthurt support coming from a defeated game, no I don't even play support.
But anyway, my original idea of this thread is that these scores are compared between the same role. Even for Kog, 3/1/10 is better than 20/19/2 because yes,

> 1 mistake can cost you the game

That is exactly what's gonna happen if you haven't finished the game after 20 kills and 19 deaths, that's called late game.

Well even if your numbers are made up the are pretty accurate 
i had a game with similar numbers some days ago 

** Beside this taking no gametime in account**

Some Champions like 
 {{champion:11}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:96}} 
 woud still be better and dangerous with a score of 20/19/2 as with of KDA 3/1/10 

It all summs up to what champions your playing

Dont get me wrong normaly i woud say the same as you!
Playing safe is the right choice but sometimes you dont have this option because certain champions massively outscale others in mid/late game or like currently in the meta you need to win as fast as possible to not to risk tilting because of death timers.
 
So you are forced more or less to risk trades and as long the right person benefits from it is ok.
oh geez can punch you

Ehh, gotta disagree with you on that one.

If someone is 20/19/2, that means they've spent a _lot_ of time dead. They have also given the enemy team a _lot_ of gold. Both of these things are very counter-intuitive to playing well.

If someone is truly trying to do well, they would get a kill without being killed himself, so they can provide map pressure and do things while the opponent is off the field.

Additionally, if you have 20 kills, you might be individually fed, sure. But with 19 deaths, that means that not only have you given them 19 kills worth of gold (holy cow), but also probably, what, 40+ assists? That's an ENORMOUS amount of gold you've given up.

So now _not only_ is their entire team is at least moderately fed (just from you alone; never mind what they've been doing to your poor teammates) compared to your teammates, but _you_, with your oh-so-massive 20 kills, can't seem to do anything because you always trade 1-for-1. You are now effectively less than worthless to your team.

3/1/10 - the deaths = 2/0/9 really good
20/19/2 -the deaths = 1/0/0 no wear close to as good

So whos better in 50 min game?

 {{champion:40}} 03/01/10 / Minion Kills 0
 {{champion:96}} 20/19/02 / Minions Kills 350

We can play this game all day long and we always woud get a diffrent result. 

But i rather say the same thing as in the other topic.
To only to look at a KDA is stupid you need to look at each game individually.

Because the KDA is nothing more as a statistic number.

It neither includes the flow of the game.
Take in account of champions and match ups.
Farm or Impact of individual plays.

You dont see in a KDA
The baron steal what started the comeback
The dragon steal what delay the game
The champion with 350 farm at 40 min
The crucial moment what lost/won you the game
The damage what a player has done in combat
The Player who never is present but clean up the teamfights
The player whos running away to save his perfect kda

I rather sacrifice myself as support player to safe my ADC or create possibilitys for my team before walking away and have a good KDA. Of course suicide missions not includet.
